channel.title: Hugo on Orbital Coding
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Orbital Coding

item.title: Another point about Static Site Generators
item.description: Yes, static website site generators like http://gohugo.io are light on server resources and provide a great workflow. However there’s one limitation worth mentioning : editing on the go. Indeed when using a CMS like WordPress editing options abound for the wandering blogger. WordPress offers a dedicated iOS and Android app. Moreover other dedicated editors specialize in WordPress content creation. And last, you can default to using the web interface either through wordpress.
